column5: Recently, we have had a few members register for more than one account for various reasons.  Just a reminder that we are all allowed only ONE account.  Setting up an additional user id/member name with result in immediate removal from the board.  Most of these second accounts are used for spamming, trolling or getting around ModQ, all of which are unacceptable.   There.  I said it.
Actually you typed it.  Reviewing the board rules might be a good time killer for the bored and the forgetful (like me).
Does this mean I have to delete my Spiel account?
I'm afraid so, Joe. I just deleted my TJ account.
Who has the time to make another OFC account lol. Some people with too much time i guess.
No you can keep it Joe, I'll delete mine. TJ will also have to delete his Fishergirl account.
Is that one account per IP address?  I've seen some folks sign in on their spouses account...   ... aint that right TJ?
Don't look now... but your pants are on fire!!!
Now that would just not be right
